Legal_Issue: Whether the Pensions Appeal Board correctly applied the legal test of 'an arguable case' and reasonably assessed eligibility for disability benefits
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed disability due to thumb injury in 1999; worked regularly until 2004; delusional disorder began after minimum qualifying period (MQP)
Decision_Outcome: Judicial review dismissed; applicant found ineligible for disability benefits
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of PAB's denial of disability benefit appeal
Court_Ruling: PAB applied correct legal test and reasonably concluded applicant did not meet eligibility criteria
Claimant_Status: Applicant seeking disability benefits under CPP
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged error in PAB's application of legal test and assessment of disability eligibility
Legal_Standard: Severe and prolonged disability as of MQP
Assessment_Factor: Onset of disability relative to MQP; medical evidence; work history
Procedural_Issue: Review conducted by Federal Court under correctness and reasonableness standards
Evidence_Used: Medical records, work history, PAB and Review Tribunal findings
Legal_Provision_Cited: Canada Pension Plan provisions on disability benefits
Application_Basis: Claim of disability due to thumb injury and mental health condition
Evidence_Assessed: Evidence showed no severe and prolonged disability by end of MQP
Relief_Sought: Overturning of PAB decision denying disability benefits
Governing_Rule: Claimant must prove severe and prolonged disability as of MQP
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of evidence showing disability during MQP
Cause_Description: Applicant sought judicial review after PAB denied appeal on disability benefit denial
Evidence_Handling: Federal Court reviewed evidence from PAB and Review Tribunal
Evidence_Issues: Delusional disorder onset post-MQP weakens claim for disability during MQP
Evidence_Assessment: PAB reasonably assessed evidence and found no arguable case for disability by MQP
Decision_Rationale: No evidence of severe and prolonged disability existing by end of minimum qualifying period
Evidentiary_Issues: Temporal disconnect between injury, mental health diagnosis, and MQP
Legal_Standard_Applied: Arguable case test under correctness and reasonableness standards
